player
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
AsynchronousPlayer, SynchronousPlayer
public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class for encapsulating player logic. As the player types are very different in regards of calculating their next move and communication with the local game, the implementation of this logic is left to specialized classes.

createPlayer

public static Player createPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                                  Game game,
                                  GameColor color,
                                  int type)
Factory method for creating the correct player according to the given player type. Returns an instance of a player.

Parameters:
name - the name of the player.
game - the game the player participates in.
color - the color of the player.
type - the type of the player.

an instance of a player.
